name: CMTextJustificationValue
desc: An integer value that describes the justification modes for text media.

items.name: var kCMTextJustification_left_top: CMTextJustificationValue
items.desc: A type that describes left justification when specified for horizontal justification, top justification for vertical justification.

items.name: var kCMTextJustification_centered: CMTextJustificationValue
items.desc: A type that describes center justification (both horizontal and vertical justification).

items.name: var kCMTextJustification_bottom_right: CMTextJustificationValue
items.desc: A type that describes bottom justification when specified for vertical justification, right justification for horizontal justification.
